V03vinv11_u:43_11: tadyathā ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyām aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ strīparīkṣāyāṃ puruṣaparīkṣāyāṃ ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ /

V03vinv11_u:44_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.2 so 'pareṇa samayena bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:44_1: tasya bhagavaddarśanāt saddharmaśravaṇāc ca bhagavacchāsane prasādo jātaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:44_3: sa mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayaty aṃbānujānīhi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajāmīti /
V03vinv11_u:44_4: sā kathayati tvaṃ mamaikaputro yāvad ahaṃ jīvāmi tāvan na pravrajitavyaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:44_5: mṛtāyāṃ mayi yatheṣṭaṃ kariṣyasīti Ś sa kathayaty aṃba samayenāhaṃ na pravrajāmi yadi tvaṃ divase divase saṃghoddiṣṭakān bhikṣūn bhājayasīti /
V03vinv11_u:44_6: sā kathayati putra evaṃ karomīti Ś sa cottaro yat kiṃcid upārjayati tat sarvaṃ mātre 'nuprayacchati Ś ambānena śramaṇabrāhmaṇān pratipādayeti Ś sāsya mātā matsarī kuṭukuṃcikā āgṛhītapariṣkārā kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati prāg eva śramaṇabrāhmaṇān pratipādayiṣyati Ś ye tu śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ piṇḍārthinas taṃ gṛhaṃ praviśanti tān paribhāṣate tarjayati ca /
V03vinv11_u:44_7: pretopannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhikṣām aṭateti /
V03vinv11_u:44_8: taṃ ca putraṃ vipralaṃbhayati adya mayā iyanto bhikṣavo bhojitā iyatān śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ bhikṣā datteti Ś sā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena kālaṃ kṛtvā preteṣūpapannā /
V03vinv11_u:44_9: uttaro 'pi mātṛviyogād dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:45_1: tam āgamya mrakṣaṣaṇḍānivāsī citro gṛhapatir bhagavacchāsane prasannaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:45_4: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmata (292v1 = GBM 897) uttarasyānyatamasmin karvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyam utpannaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:45_5: sa tatra gataḥ / āyuṣmāṃś copaseno valgantīputro paṃcaśataparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caraṃ mrakṣaṣaṇḍām anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:45_6: aśrauṣīc citro gṛhapatir yathā upaseno valgantīputraḥ paṃcaśataparivāro janapadacārikāṃ carann ihānuprāpta iti /
V03vinv11_u:45_7: śrutvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:45_8: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata upasenasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /

V03vinv11_u:45_10: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm /
V03vinv11_u:45_11: atha citro gṛhapatir utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayyāyuṣmantam upasenam idam avocat* /
V03vinv11_u:45_12: adhivāsayatu me ārya upasenaś cāntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenety /

V03vinv11_u:45_14: atha citro gṛhapatir āyuṣmata upasenasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapayaty /
V03vinv11_u:46_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.4 āyuṣmāṃś cottaras tasmāt karvaṭakād āgataḥ /
V03vinv11_u:46_1: yāvat paśyati na śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ nāpy āhāram upānvāhṛtaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:46_2: sa ārāmikān āmantrayate / bhavanta kim alpotsukās tiṣṭhatha nāsanaprajñaptiḥ kriyate nāpy āhāra upānvāhriyate /
V03vinv11_u:46_4: te kathayanti citreṇa gṛhapatinā bhikṣusaṃgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /

V03vinv11_u:46_8: ahaṃ tasya sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ Ś katham asau māṃ pratyākhyāyāyuṣmantam upasenaṃ valgantīputraṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upanimantrayati Ś gacchāmi tāvat paśyāmīti /
V03vinv11_u:46_9: sa yena citro gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrānto yāvat paśyati citraṃ gṛhapatim āsanaprajñaptiṃ kriyamāṇaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:47_1: ārya śobhanā āsanaprajñaptiḥ śobhanaś cāhāra iti /
V03vinv11_u:47_3: uttaraḥ kathayati gṛhapate śobhanā āsanaprajñaptiḥ śobhanaś cāhāra /
V03vinv11_u:47_4: kiṃ tu tilapūpalikā nāsti / sa kathayati / bhadantottara vijñātaṃ / tena hy upamāṃ tāvac chṛṇu : upamayā ca punar ihaike vijñapuruṣā bhāṣitasyārtham ājānanti Ś bhūtapūrvaṃ bhadantottara saṃbahulā jāṃbūdvīpakā vaṇijaḥ sāmudraṃ yānapātraṃ pratipādya kākaṃ kukkuṭīṃ cādāya mahāsamudram avatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ /
V03vinv11_u:47_5: yāvad asau kukkuṭī kukkuṭam alabhamānā kākena sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ gatā :
V03vinv11_u:47_7: sa kākakukkuṭīkaṃ vāśyate na kāko na kukkuṭaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:47_8: evam eva tvaṃ mokṣārthī pravrajito mokṣamārgam alabhamāno yad vā tad vā (293r1 = GBM 898) pralapasīti /
V03vinv11_u:47_9: evam ukte āyuṣmān uttaras tāḍakakuṃcikāṃ ca tasya purastād utsṛjya saṃprasthitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:48_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.6 tenoktaḥ / bhadanta uttara kutra gacchasi /
V03vinv11_u:48_1: śrāvastīṃ / svacittaṃ pratilabhasva ihaiva tiṣṭha mā gaccha /
V03vinv11_u:48_2: sthānam etad vidyate yat tvayā punar āgatyāham eva kṣamayitavya iti /
V03vinv11_u:48_3: tasya vacanam avacanīkṛtya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caraṃ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:48_5: svāgataṃ svāgatam āyuṣmann uttara prītā vayaṃ tvaddarśanena no tv āgamanena /
V03vinv11_u:48_6: kiṃ karaṇam* Ś tvam āgamya citro gṛhapatir mrakṣaṣaṇḍāyāṃ buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān karoti /
V03vinv11_u:48_7: āgantukānāṃ ca gāmikānāṃ ca mrakṣaṣaṇḍā pratisaraṇam* /

V03vinv11_u:48_10: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti Ś bhagavān āha Ś kuruta yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ uttarasya bhikṣor gṛhapati-r-avasphaṇḍakasya pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ karma iti /
V03vinv11_u:49_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.7 paṃcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛtam adharmakarma ca tad avinayakarma ca bhavati pūrvavad yāvad asaṃmukhībhūtasya kurvanti /
V03vinv11_u:49_1: evaṃ ca punaḥ kartavyam* / śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:50_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.8 śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ / anenottareṇa bhikṣuṇā citro gṛhapatir avasphaṇḍitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:50_1: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃgha uttarasya bhikṣor gṛhapati-r-avasphaṇḍakasya pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ karma kuryād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ Ś
V03vinv11_u:51_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.9 tataḥ karma kartavyaṃ / śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ / anenottareṇa bhikṣuṇā mrakṣaṣaṇḍāyāṃ citro gṛhapatir avasphaṇḍitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:51_1: tat saṃgha uttarasya bhikṣor gṛhapati-r-avasphaṇḍakasya pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ karma karoti /
V03vinv11_u:51_2: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate uttarasya bhikṣor gṛhapati-r-avasphaṇḍakasya pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ karma kartuṃ te tūṣṇīṃ /
V03vinv11_u:51_3: na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ / iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ dvitīyā tṛtīyā karmavācanā kartavyā /

V03vinv11_u:51_5: kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03vinv11_u:52_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.10 pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛtasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñapayāmi /
V03vinv11_u:52_1: pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛtena bhikṣuṇā na pravrājayitavyaṃ pūrvavad yāvat* /
V03vinv11_u:52_2: sa evaṃ pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛta utkacaprakacaḥ saṃghe roma pātayati /
V03vinv11_u:52_3: niḥsaraṇaṃ pravartayati / sāmīcīm upadarśayati / antaḥsīmāyāṃ ca sthitvā osāraṇāṃ yācate /
V03vinv11_u:52_6: bhagavān āha Ś osārayata yūyaṃ bhikṣava uttaraṃ bhikṣuṃ pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛtam iti /
V03vinv11_u:53_1: katamaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ / utkacaprakacaḥ pūrvavad yāvad gṛhapatyavasphaṇḍakatvāc ca prativiramāmīti vadati /
V03vinv11_u:53_3: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ Ś
V03vinv11_u:54_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.12 śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ / anenottareṇa bhikṣuṇā mrakṣaṣaṇḍāyāṃ citro gṛhapatir avasphaṇḍitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:54_1: tad asya saṃghena gṛhapatir avasphaṇḍaka iti kṛtvā pratisaṃharaṇīyakarma kṛtaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:54_2: so 'yam uttaro bhikṣuḥ pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛta utkacaprakacaḥ pūrvavad yāvad gṛhapatyavasphaṇḍakatvāc ca prativiramāmīti vadati /
V03vinv11_u:54_3: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ uttaraṃ bhikṣuṃ pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmakṛtam osārayed ity eṣā jñaptiḥ /
V03vinv11_u:54_4: / tato vaktavyo gaccha taṃ gṛhapatiṃ kṣamaya osārito bhaviṣyasīti Ś
V03vinv11_u:55_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.13 sa bhikṣubhir evam abhihito yena mrakṣaṣaṇḍā tena cārikāṃ prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caraṃ mrakṣaṣaṇḍām anuprāptaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:55_1: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena citro gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ Ś upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya kathayati Ś kṣamasva mama gṛhapate Ś kṣāntaṃ bhadantottara Ś yady evam ihaiva prativasa /
V03vinv11_u:55_2: gacchāmi tāvad yena mamāparādhhaṃ tasya nigrahaṃ karomi /
V03vinv11_u:55_3: kiṃ mayāparādhhaṃ / na tava yena mamāparāddhaṃ Ś
V03vinv11_u:56_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.14 athāyuṣmān uttaro gaṃgātīraṃ gatvā tribhis tālavṛndaiḥ kuṭikāṃ kṛtvā varṣā upagataḥ /
V03vinv11_u:56_2: tasya nātidūre mārgas tena satataṃ gopāṅganā gacchati Ś sa tāsāṃ pātraṃ prasārayati Ś tasmin dadhiṃ vā kṣīraṃ vā udaśviṃ vānuprayacchanti Ś tat paribhujya dhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhāni abhināmayati Ś
V03vinv11_u:57_0: Pāṇḍ-v § 4.15 yāvad apareṇa samayena dve gopāṅgane gacchato mātā duhitā ca Ś duhitā mātuḥ kathayaty amba eṣa āryo mūka iti Ś sā kathayati putri naiṣa mūkaḥ nūnam anena kasyacid vācā aparāddham* tasyā eṣa nigrahaṃ karotīti Ś amba kim etad evaṃ bhaviṣyati Ś putri svo 'haṃ tava pratyakṣīkariṣyāmīti Ś yāvad aparasmin divase mathitaghaṭaṃ gṛhītvā duhitṛsametā taṃ pradeśam āgatā /
V03vinv11_u:57_2: sā tasya pātraṃ mathitasya pūrayitum ārabdhā Ś āyuṣmān uttaraḥ pātraṃ cālayati /

V03vinv11_u:102_1: abhavyaḥ prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya caturthasya maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyā ākāśānantyāyatanasya vijñānānantyāyatanasya ākiṃcanyāyatanasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya srotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya anāgāmiphalasya ṛddhiviṣayasya divyasya śrotrasya cetaḥparyāyasya pūrvanivāsasya cyutyupapādasyāsravakṣayasya /
V03vinv11_u:103_0: Pāṇḍ-v 7.5.8 anayā te udāyinn āpattyā adeśitayā apratideśitayā dvayor gatyor anyatarānyatarā gatiḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā narakā vā tiryaṃco vā /
V03vinv11_u:103_1: / uktaṃ bhagavatā dve praticchannakarmāntasya gatī narakā vā tiryaṃco vā /
V03vinv11_u:103_2: ye me bhāṣitaṃ na śraddhāsyanti te praticchādayitavyaṃ maṃsyante Ś
V03vinv11_u:104_0: Pāṇḍ-v 7.5.9 śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ / ayam udāyī bhikṣuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣām āpattim āpannaḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitām ardhamāsapraticchannāṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_1: tenānena udāyinā bhikṣuṇā asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ saṃghād ardhamāsaṃ parivāso yācitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_2: datto 'sya saṃghena udāyino bhikṣor asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyā ardhamāsaṃ parivāsaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_3: so 'yaṃ pārivāsika eva san* saṃghāvaśeṣām āpattim āpanno 'ntarāpattiṃ pūrvāpattipratirūpāṃ praticchannāṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_4: tenānena udāyinā bhikṣuṇā asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ antarāpatteḥ (302r1 = GBM 916) pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyāḥ saṃghān mūlaparivāso yācitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_5: datto 'sya saṃghena udāyino bhikṣor asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ antarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_6: so 'yaṃ mūlapārivāsika eva san* saṃghāvaśeṣām āpattim āpannaḥ pratyantarāpattim antarāpattipratirūpāṃ praticchannāṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_7: tenānena udāyinā bhikṣuṇā asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyāḥ saṃghān mūlāpakarṣo yācitaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_8: datto 'sya saṃghena udāyino bhikṣor asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyāḥ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaḥ /
V03vinv11_u:104_9: tenānena udāyinā bhikṣuṇā asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsenāntarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitena pratyantarāpatteḥ antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitena saṃghāt ṣaḍrātraṃ mānāpyaṃ yācitaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_10: dattam asya saṃghena udāyino bhikṣor asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsasyāntarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitasya pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitasya ṣaḍrātraṃ mānāpyaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_11: so 'yam udāyī bhikṣur asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsaḥ antarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitaḥ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitaḥ ṣaḍrātraṃ caritamānāpyaṃ saṃghād āvarhaṇaṃ yācate /
V03vinv11_u:104_12: tat saṃgha udāyinaṃ bhikṣum asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsam antarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitaṃ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitaṃ ṣaḍrātraṃ caritamānāpyam āvarhati /
V03vinv11_u:104_13: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate udāyinaṃ bhikṣum asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsam antarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitaṃ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitaṃ ṣaḍrātraṃ caritamānāpyam āvarhituṃ te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_14: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ dvitīyā tṛtīyā karmavācanā kartavyā Ś āvarhitaḥ saṃghena udāyī bhikṣur asyāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāyā āpatteḥ saṃcintyaśukravisṛṣṭisamutthitāyā (302v1 = GBM 917) ardhamāsapraticchannāyāḥ paryuṣitaparivāsaḥ antarāpatteḥ pūrvāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlaparivāsaparyuṣitaḥ pratyantarāpatter antarāpattipratirūpāyāḥ praticchannāyā mūlāpakarṣaparyuṣitaḥ ṣaḍrātraṃ caritamānāpyaṃ /
V03vinv11_u:104_15: kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
